item.title: Zenva Object Oriented C++ course
item.description: Zenva Learn Object-Oriented C++ by Building a Game Link to heading A while ago I bought a bunch of Zenva programming courses from Humble Bundle as some of the courses covered C++, which I hadn’t touched since university, but was becoming a language that I was dealing with semi frequently in my new role. So, this was a “refresher” on the C++ world and where it had come to in the last 10 years or.
